title: PlayStation President: It Feels Like ‘We’ve Been Fighting Against Obsolescence’
text:
PlayStation President: It Feels Like ‘We’ve Been Fighting Against Obsolescence’ 
Published By: Gamerant.com - Today 
Sony PlayStation president Shuhei Yoshida explains that with everybody saying console gaming is dead, he feels like they've been "fighting a...
